description: In nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/services.py, the presence of the extended services API extension is checked in some places, but not all places it needs to be.  There are some uses of disabled_reason not guarded by this check.
title: some checks missing for presence of extended-services API extension

comments.content: In nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/services.py, the presence of the extended services API extension is checked in some places, but not all places it needs to be.  There are some uses of disabled_reason not guarded by this check.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
